website_summaries.verdict: Users say this formula's luxurious natural scents and exotic moisturizers turn your shower into a spa experience.
pros: Gentle and non-drying on the skin
Hints of nut, floral and salted caramel scents
Cupuaçu butter and coconut oil are the secret moisturizing weapons
cons: Some said the moisturizing properties and scent did not live up to expectations

customer_reviews.title: Fake product sent
customer_reviews.text: I was sent a very poor fake product. I compared the product to one I had previously purchased. The bottles look completely different. This one had no scent to it and the consistency was like cheap hand soap. So disappointed at myself for even ordering this product off Amazon because I know fake cosmetics routinely get sent. Now I have the hassle of dealing with a return.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Not A 13 Oz. Bottle??
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if I'm the only one this has happened to, but I thought I was getting a 13 oz. bottle for the price (that's what the picture shows at least.) Nowhere does it mention anything about a 3 oz. bottle. That, or I must have missed something. It's in small, plastic IKEA bag, which seems odd to me. Honestly I'm really surprised anyone would actually send this tiny bottle out for $24.30, which is what I paid. Definitely returning it..
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany A.

customer_reviews.title: Three stars
customer_reviews.text: So o give this three stars Kai ky Because of course the smell is amazing just like the bum bum cream...but it does not lather up very good like I hoped. Also the scent AFTER you get out of the shower doesn't really stay on. 25.00 is alot for a bottle of body wash in my opinion but I splurged just to try this. Yes I like it but do I love it? Nah...will I be ordering again? Nah just not worth 25.00 to me. Maybeeee 15.00? Definitely not almost 30.00 bc of tax and stuff so yah idk that's just my opinion
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Armour

customer_reviews.title: It's nice, but not crazy about it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after watching Tati's videos. The scent is nice, but nothing that drives me crazy for it. It is a fairly moisturizing gel, doesn't lather up much. Not bad.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: My favorite!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite body wash! It smells heavenly and exactly like the Bum Bum Cream. It lathers fantastically but doesn’t strip your skin. It makes my skin so soft and leaves it smelling fantastic for LONG time after using. It’s not cheap but a bottle lasts awhile, you don’t need much for a full creamy lather. It’s also awesome as a shave gel! The cap is a little annoying, but I deal with it because it’s a fantastic product. I just find it a little hard to flip open and snap close with one hand. If you like the scent of the Bum Bum Cream, you’ll love this body wash just as much. Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: TickTockAliceTop Contributor: Eye Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Love!!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is really nice. I have pretty dry skin, and although it isn't the most moisturizing formulation ever, it does not strip my skin or make it feel dry/tight like lots of others do. I LOVE the smell of this (Sephora carries this line if you'd like to smell it in person before purchasing online) and it does linger for quite some time after a shower. I will say that this has smelled more like the lotion when I have shaken the bottle, but overall this is a great product. It lathers very nicely and it also does not take a ton of product to get a lather, so you could make this last quite some time.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Amazing smell and quality!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this. It's my second time purchasing it after buying a whole set from Sephora. I LOVE the smell of Sol de Janeiro bum bum cream/body spray and this shower cream smells exactly the same, so you can layer your fragrance. If you love warm, sweet tropical smells, you will love this. Aside from the amazing smell, their products are of extremely high quality. The cream is not sticky or greasy whatsoever. It just makes your skin super soft. There are people selling this for insane amounts of money. Just buy it from Sephora or Amazon directly.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Tati made me buy it :/
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE the scent & it is moisturizing BUT it doesn’t lather up very much. I like a sudsy body wash & this just isn’t one. Because of the lack of suds I had to use a bunch. I eventually started mixing it with another body wash & that worked best for me. Won’t be repurchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Lacy

customer_reviews.title: Just love this brand!
customer_reviews.text: I always use the Bum Bum cream an LOVE the smell so I decided to try another product and this did NOT disappoint....the same original GORGEOUS signature smell from Sol de Janeiro and a little does go along way as it does sud up very nicely on a body. It made my skin very soft and I did not feel like I had a film of soap left on me...the only downfall is the smell doesn't last that long.
customer_reviews.author: NIKKI

customer_reviews.title: Helps with stretch marks
customer_reviews.text: The scent is amazing 😍 just wish it stayed longer. However I've noticed my dark (bluish purple) stretch marks on my stomach get lighter an blending in with my normal skin tone. I'd buy this again along with the cream to keep the scent longer 😉. Plus the cream works great for dry skin. I personally feel it tightens the skin a little.
customer_reviews.author: San

customer_reviews.title: So worth it!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase of this body wash and I love it. It smells so good. It is a little pricey but a little goes a long way and as a busy mom of 2 I need some kind of luxury. Even if it's a rushed 5 minute shower.
customer_reviews.author: Paige Doeberl

customer_reviews.title: Ohhhhh yes
customer_reviews.text: TLDR: Get it because it smells good If you've used bum bum cream before: Smell is the same (yaaaaaas) If you've never used bum bum before: Super luxurious body wash (foams up like clouds) Smells like angels and heaven and unicorns Ultra-hydrating
customer_reviews.author: Princess Proton

customer_reviews.title: Luxurious!
customer_reviews.text: I tried the Bum Bum cream and instantly fell in love! The scent was captivating and I was hooked. It left my skin silky smooth, so I wanted to try this. I am not disappointed at all but I wish the scent lasted a bit longer. It works well when I layer it with the cream though. This is very moisturizing and cleansing!
customer_reviews.author: CutieMama

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Wish this was more affordable bc I would buy a million if I could. Makes my skin so soft, makes me feel clean. The smell is addicting. I recommend this to everyone I meet or asks. As an esthetician it’s a great product for skin.
customer_reviews.author: NC

customer_reviews.title: Love the scentl and the hydration
customer_reviews.text: Surprise to me when this product was recommended by someone on YouTube and it actually did what they said it does. Hydration and moisturizing...love this product! It's a bit pricey but I love it and you will too! Don't need much of the product to get a good later. If you don't like it, contact me I will take it off your hands. Seriously.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the smell!
customer_reviews.text: Love the smell! I bought this to go along with both the lotion and the body spray. The fragrance doesn’t last as long as I would like but it does smell wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: smells nice however im not sure i can justify the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought based off recommendation. Lathers well, smells nice however im not sure i can justify the price. It doesnt seem to do any more than my previously used Dove. Ill give it another month see if it proves me wrong. Otherwise i can get 4 bottles of the dove on subscribe and save for less cost. We shall see.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa S

customer_reviews.title: smells soooo good
customer_reviews.text: It smells so great, and gets. the job done. I would buy again for sure. I don't think it dries my skin, but as someone with normally fairly dry skin to start, I haven't noticed any change since switching to this body wash. But again- it smells so good.
customer_reviews.author: Claire S.

customer_reviews.title: No tropical coconut scent
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected. Not an attractive scent. Not really a scent at all! However, it is moisturizing. I probably wont buy again. I dont recommend this product if you are expecting a coconut tropical scent! It's just not there!
customer_reviews.author: northa w sanchez

customer_reviews.title: This shower cream is for dry skin and it's ok
customer_reviews.text: I'm not 100% in love with this shower gel/cream. It was hyped as the answer to dry skin and it is better than some products, but not as fabulous as it was presented. It smells like the caribbean, but it does not linger. It's ok.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Smells great
customer_reviews.text: Leaves skin soft after a shower and smells amazing! This is my favorite body wash! I highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Original Dakota

customer_reviews.title: A little pricey, but THE SMELL!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Ok, so this stuff is a little expensive for a body wash. but, the smell! THE SMELL! It's amazing. If summer had a smell, this is it. A little coconut, a little island fruit. Lathers up nice & leaves you feeling moderately moisturized. You won't regret this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: TJones

customer_reviews.title: Ohhhh that smell though! ❤️
customer_reviews.text: So many compliments on the scent! It’s smells like a tropical drink. I had to buy the body spray as well because I can’t get enough. It’s a little pricey for what you get but I try to stretch it out as long as possible.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Ringel

customer_reviews.title: This is definitely more moisturizing than my usual shower gel ...
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely more moisturizing than my usual shower gel. The scent is a little strong for my preferences, but it got me through the winter while keeping my skin more moisturized than normal. I didn't have to use lotion as often to relieve dry skin.
customer_reviews.author: M. A. Janicki

customer_reviews.title: DON’T BUY IT IS FAKE
customer_reviews.text: This is a very cheap fake. I’m really disappointed. It’s awful.
customer_reviews.author: maggie mcintyre

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely the best smelling  bath or shower gel
customer_reviews.text: This product is absolutely awesome! It's thick, luxurious and the smell is out of this world. Love this stuff. I only gave it 4 stars because I thought it was a bit pricey!
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: Nice smell, but too expensive
customer_reviews.text: Nothing more special than other shower creams. Smells great, but too expensive for the amount you receive.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: The scent!
customer_reviews.text: God I love this stuff. The smell is amazing and reminds me of what being on vacation must be like. It makes my skin feel soft and smooth. It has a very luxurious lather. Did I mention the smell?
customer_reviews.author: Qbertm

customer_reviews.title: You don’t know what your missing!
customer_reviews.text: I have been watching Tati on YouTube and she recommended this product.. I smell more of a Tahitian summer scent like a deep rich Carmel , musk , nut , clean scent.. The scent last at least 8 hours on me and works well with my husband. I have psoriasis and the moisturizer in this product is very soothing on my skin and helps prevent cracks and bleeding
customer_reviews.author: Beth Leitgabel

customer_reviews.title: Very nice smell but it is a pricey body wash
customer_reviews.text: I really love the smell of this body wash and it does feel nice. It is pretty expensive for a body wash so I won’t be rebuying but if you want to pamper yourself I’d say it’s worth it
customer_reviews.author: stephanie turnipseed

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous scent
customer_reviews.text: I was given this product, and I have had it for 6 month absolutely love love the scent and my skin feel very soft
customer_reviews.author: Irene Neumann

customer_reviews.title: Great scent
customer_reviews.text: I really love the scent of this and my husband does too. I've had it on subscription because we like it that much.
customer_reviews.author: Yuvonne Moore

customer_reviews.title: clean freak
customer_reviews.text: a little expensive but smells sooo good Like u r at the beach on vacation
customer_reviews.author: clean freak

customer_reviews.title: good, not earthshattering for the price
customer_reviews.text: Nice smell, feels good. Didn't really sooth my dry itchy bod though. Too expensive on that basis.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this shower gel just wish it was cheaper
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: really wanted to like this
customer_reviews.text: I was really disappointed by the smell of this. All the hype, reviews, and honestly the packaging made me believe it was a nice tropical scent. Like mango or papaya. Nope, its closer to the vanilla scents you smell around christmas time. Which i strongly dislike. I also found it to be really thick in consistency, which i didn't enjoy either.
customer_reviews.author: J.L.

customer_reviews.title: Smelly
customer_reviews.text: If you want to smell like you just put on sunscreen, then this is for you. I only picked a 2 because it did moisturize some
customer_reviews.author: Sophia Poppy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality, for the first time I tried sol ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality, for the first time I tried sol de janeiro and instantly fell in love. I can totally tell the difference between this and other body wash and soaps... this is by far the best body was I have tried... I am soon going to get the whole sol de janeiro line...!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Strong smell, moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: It is moisturizing, but has such a strong smell I cannot use it. The odor is good, just too strong for me.
customer_reviews.author: rivergal

customer_reviews.title: Clean with your bum bum
customer_reviews.text: Love the smell hands-down makes your body feel really clean with a wonderful scent you just want to keep using it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: This stuff smells amazing and I due notice that my skin isn't as ...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff smells amazing and I due notice that my skin isn't as dry as it normally is. Also, it pairs nicely with the Bum Bum cream.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Bambino

customer_reviews.title: Best body lotion I’ve tried !
customer_reviews.text: This product smells so nice and is very moisturizing . I heard about it on a beauty blog and I’ve already ordered more !
customer_reviews.author: Lynn S

customer_reviews.title: Smells Heavenly
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my wife after she saw Tati talk about it on YouTube. It smells amazing and her skin is super smooth. Not gonna lie, I’ve used it once or twice and absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Amaaaazing scent!
customer_reviews.text: The scent is heavenly! I have been using this all winter long. While my skin still needs moisturizers after a shower, I don’t get that dry scaly skin I used to get before.
customer_reviews.author: kmctrl

customer_reviews.title: Great smell...
customer_reviews.text: I buy this for my wife. She won't spend this kind of money but I will because she smells wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Pratt

customer_reviews.title: Two thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: This stuff smells so good just like the Bum Bum cream, it also lathers very well.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Great Bum Bum Wash !!!
customer_reviews.text: Love , Love , Love this stuff ! It smells so so good and makes your skin feel Great !
customer_reviews.author: Mary Watson

customer_reviews.title: Just Okay
customer_reviews.text: I love beach inspired (coconut) body care. This body wash doesn't really standout in any area other than cost. It does hydrate your skin but the smell isn't long lasting and frankly no better than run of the mill pharmacy products. I will keep trying!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Every shower feels like I’m on a vacation soon as the scent hits my nose
customer_reviews.text: This is the only body wash I have been using for a year since I first bought it. Every shower feels like I’m on a vacation
customer_reviews.author: Aza

customer_reviews.title: Great product, poor shipping.
customer_reviews.text: Huge fan of this product, but very upset with recent purchase. It was mailed in a thin mailing envelope and the top was completely shattered and product everywhere. A huge disappointment because I’m completely out and now have to deal with returning this and cleaning off the other item I ordered with it. As for the product itself- I love the smell and it leaves me feeling clean and moisturized! Have used several bottles since I discovered it.
customer_reviews.author: Dachshundguyy

customer_reviews.title: Love the product, service is great but pricey.
customer_reviews.text: Love the product but it’s expensive and the bottle is not that big.
customer_reviews.author: Nana Rita

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I’ll buy again If they removeed the bad chemicals and kept the amazing smell
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Salem

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality packaging.
customer_reviews.text: Tab for opening the top came broken off and left a sharp edge. Not very happy with the quality of the packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Isaiah

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: A little pricey for what it is. Wasnt as moisturizing as I thought it would be. Smells great though.
customer_reviews.author: Bryna Oxendine

customer_reviews.title: The most expensive body wash EVER
customer_reviews.text: Buy Olay or something else, unless they drop the price to under 10 dollars this is too expensive for what you get
customer_reviews.author: Isabella L

customer_reviews.title: Fragrant and rich!
customer_reviews.text: Very rich and moisturizing shower gel with a delicious scent!
customer_reviews.author: Sparkle in Sac

customer_reviews.title: My new fave
customer_reviews.text: Smells like heaven. Like pineapple upside down cake. Doesn’t strip the moisture from your skin. Just a great body wash
customer_reviews.author: Terra

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great just wish it were a little cheaper 25 for soap is a lot
customer_reviews.author: Robbin Hildreth

customer_reviews.title: The scent is rich...
customer_reviews.text: This product is a little pricey to use as a bath product. The scent is rich and there was some moisturizing element in it and I would like to try it again.... but I am stuck on the price
customer_reviews.author: Margaret A.

customer_reviews.title: Smelly smelly smells !
customer_reviews.text: It’s smells great at first ...... but you smell it ALL DAY LONG !! And becomes (to me ) over powering . Will mix with your cologne or perfume so be careful. But is a good product
customer_reviews.author: Donald Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great scent
customer_reviews.text: Great scent ! Lasts a long time. Feels like a special spa day.
customer_reviews.author: cc

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful smell
customer_reviews.text: Pricey but worth it for the great smell! It leaves my skin soft and brightens my mornings with its great smell!
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: The best smell ever!!
customer_reviews.text: Omg I love this stuff it smells amazing and stays with you all day. Just wish there was more to it!!
customer_reviews.author: jonnie

customer_reviews.title: Addictive
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using for about one year and I love it. It’s a splurge for me
customer_reviews.author: Melinda M.

customer_reviews.title: Not that great
customer_reviews.text: I read the product reviews and my skin can get very dry in the winter. Smells great, but I haven't seen it do anything miraculous.
customer_reviews.author: Gia

customer_reviews.title: The scent!!!
customer_reviews.text: Holy smoke!!! The scent is everything! Just like heaven. Don’t expect to be a strong body wash or moisturizer. It’s a fine body wash.
customer_reviews.author: Faye

customer_reviews.title: My skin is soft as silk and smells amazing
customer_reviews.text: It smells amazing and my skin is so soft now. Arrived sealed and on time.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Love the smell
customer_reviews.text: I love love love the smell of this product. Just like the cream. The body wash is very moisturizing and has a good leather.
customer_reviews.author: Cristina Reyes-Dixon

customer_reviews.title: Smells delicious and makes my skin so soft!!!
customer_reviews.text: This shower gel is my new favorite!!! The smell and creaminess is amazing!! Love, love, love this!!!
customer_reviews.author: TM3312

customer_reviews.title: Great for dry skin
customer_reviews.text: I get really dry skin in winter months. This has really helped .
customer_reviews.author: nancz

customer_reviews.title: not impressed
customer_reviews.text: love the smell but it didn't last long. I didn't feel like it moisturized my skin at all.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Kearns

customer_reviews.title: It’s not the same gel I usually get.
customer_reviews.text: I am so disappointed in my gel this time..,,,,I think you all changed the formula. The soap is thicker which is fine but the fragrance is totally different I just ordered 6 bottles.....will not order again
customer_reviews.author: Marie Jones Peacock

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This smells great in the shower and is really thick. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: ACNEL

customer_reviews.title: Very expensive and I found I like the Bath and Body products better and they are ...
customer_reviews.text: It is just ok. Very expensive and I found I like the Bath and Body products better and they are a fraction of the price..
customer_reviews.author: Alecia Brangan

customer_reviews.title: Your suntan lotion smell for the shower!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! So creamy and soothing. Great smell too! It's like your on the beach. Will definitely be buying this great product again
customer_reviews.author: Di

customer_reviews.title: Love, Love, Love!!
customer_reviews.text: This is worth the price. Every. Single. Penny. It smells amazing and makes my skin so soft and healthy looking. I think I am hooked for life!
customer_reviews.author: P Grace

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is for sure my go to body wash ...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is for sure my go to body wash if I have extra money to spend, but im not too sure it is worth the $25 ....
customer_reviews.author: megan Nicosia

customer_reviews.title: Refreshing Body Wash
customer_reviews.text: Not going to exfoliate nor deeply moisturize it is refreshing on a less active day or morning rinse. The bum bum body cream is a must for that night on the town and every summer afternoon when your skin is bare.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Echols

customer_reviews.title: Smell is delicious and it’s very moisturizing for your skin.
customer_reviews.text: Okay, this product is really good..but I really don’t see myself buying it again. It gets the job done but it’s not like the smell really lingers as I’d like it to..but you will for sure get a body wash that smells delicious and it’s very moisturizing for your skin.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Da Silva

customer_reviews.title: Sol de Janeiro moisturized body wash
customer_reviews.text: The scent is heaven. Lots of creamy suds and keeps skin soft and moisturized. I made sure i took this cleanser on vacation.
customer_reviews.author: suerue

customer_reviews.title: Smells Divine
customer_reviews.text: Smells divine. I use this body wash as a treat during the summer months; the smell of tropical pistachio brings me to a happy place when it's scalding hot outside.
customer_reviews.author: Parris

customer_reviews.title: I love this stuff and I recently ordered another bottle
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff and I recently ordered another bottle! Absolutely love the scent! It lasts a long time as well, I only have to use a quarter size amount. Definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Love this shower cleanser
customer_reviews.text: Love this shower cleanser. The smell is outstanding. This entire product line is wonderful. Would definitely buy again. Good value for your money,you don't have to use much.
customer_reviews.author: debra dziewit

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful smell and great hydrating body wash.
customer_reviews.text: Love the smell of this and the hydrating properties of this body wash.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah R. Adams-Flint

customer_reviews.title: Smell Good
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful smell, leaves you feeling clean, smelling good, and perfectly moisturized. Lasts longer than most other brands.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I am so obsessed with this body wash. A little goes a long way, it is so moisturizing. I love the smell too
customer_reviews.author: Crissys2angels

customer_reviews.title: Scent on skin
customer_reviews.text: Little pricey but the scent lasts most the day and I love the way it feels on your skin.
customer_reviews.author: davi mattingly

customer_reviews.title: Softest Skin Ever....
customer_reviews.text: This body wash is moisturizing and makes your skin smell amazing. My boyfriend loves it and can't keep his hands off! The bottle is a little pricey but so worth it. I don't think I can ever go back to a cheaper body wash.
customer_reviews.author: Kailee Turner

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This bath gel smells great.Smells just like the beach. Order this in bulk you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly C - NC USA

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Shower Gel for Dry Skin
customer_reviews.text: I have dry skin and was looking for a shower gel suited for my skin. After a little research, I went with this and I am not disappointed at all! The fragrance is amazing and this shower gel is good for my dry skin. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Saumeil Shah

customer_reviews.title: So good!
customer_reviews.text: Just can’t get enough of this body was and lotion. Makes me feel tropical and reminds me of summer all year long.
customer_reviews.author: ScottsdaleMom

customer_reviews.title: Good shower gel
customer_reviews.text: Smells amazing. I only used this a few times a week due to buying three products with the same scent at the same time. A little over kill but your skin is super soft after each use.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole H.

customer_reviews.title: Smells AMAZINNG
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely THE BEST smell !! Be sure and buy the "Bum Bum " Cream as well as the body spray. It smells SO good.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Hess

customer_reviews.title: Great smelling
customer_reviews.text: This smells SO GOOD and it lasts all day. Just wish it weren't in a plastic bottle!
customer_reviews.author: Noel D

customer_reviews.title: Nice but....
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t smell as wonderful as so many claimed. It works but I was expecting better longer lasting fragrance
customer_reviews.author: Sally ann Sulick

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: This is the best during any month. Especially in winter and dry areas. Very moisturizing and smells awesome
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing smells like a taste of summer, beaches and sun and fun.
customer_reviews.author: laura cappelletti

customer_reviews.title: Smell of heaven?
customer_reviews.text: I am obsessed with the smell of this body wash! Not extremely moisturizing, but enough that it doesn’t dry out my skin like most heavily scented body washes.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Rose

customer_reviews.title: Love the scent!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love the scent so much I've bought all the different products. A little expensive when on a budget
customer_reviews.author: Tracey S Rivard

customer_reviews.title: 100% Works!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is the Bomb! Went back for more of the Sol de Janeiro line ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Intrust Check Card Debit

product_meta.title: SOL DE JANEIRO 4 Play Moisturizing Shower Cream-Gel Body Wash, 13 Fl Oz
product_meta.description: Our addictively scented shower cream-gel body wash deeply cleanses and hydrates. The ultra-gentle, sulfate-free formula foams into a rich, creamy lather, melting away impurities without stripping skin of its natural oils. Skin is beautifully hydrated and scented with our irresistible Cheirosa ’62 fragrance and notes of pistachio and salted caramel. We only guarantee authenticity on products sold by Sol de Janeiro, USA Inc. and fulfilled by Amazon.
